title: Crypto Birds
author: Crypto Birds
content: Join us at Crypto Birds Platform for the exciting new Dual Super Staking where you can earn rewards in both Bitcoin and XCB!>> Unlock More Rewards with User Level NFTs <<With Dual Super Staking, users can use their Crypto Birds User Level NFTs to earn even higher rewards in BTC."The Collaborate2Earn model means that if you have already claimed your Crypto Birds NFTs, you can use them to boost your returns in Dual Super Staking"Use NFTs User Levels 2, 3, or 4 to receive differential APR and Bitcoin rewards on XCB Super Staking.Here's how:1. Log in and connect your wallet     >> https://bit.ly/XCBstake2. Have your XCB and NFTs ready. You can get XCB on PancakeSwap or ApeSwap, and find your NFT on OpenSea if you don't already have one.3. Since XCB is a native token of the BNB Chain, use the “NFT Bridge” to transfer your NFTs from the Polygon network to BNB Chain.     >> https://cryptobirds.com/token/nft-bridge4. Go to the “Stake” tab and select Dual Super Staking with your User Level NFT.Details of the New Dual Super Staking:1.2 million XCB and 0.135 BTC in rewards will be distributed among 5 pools for 92 days.Total tokens: 1,200,000 XCBTotal Bitcoin: 0.135 BTCDistribution duration: 92 daysCompletion date: April 28, 2023Maximize your XCB performance by participating in Crypto Birds Platform's Dual Super Staking with your NFTs:     >> https://cryptobirds.com/token/stakeSubscribe to stay in the loop!-------------------------------------Crypto Birds follow the whispering!Website: https://cryptobirds.com/Telegram Channel: https://t.me/cryptobirdsofficialTelegram Group: https://t.me/CryptoBirdsGroupTwitter: https://twitter.com/CryptoBirdsLinkedin: https://www.linkedin.com/company/cryptobirdsMedium: https://cryptobirds.medium.com/
